condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article IV. 4.01 (a) | Description :The Recipient has legally established the PCU within MINEPAT pursuant tothe Project Implementation legislation, in a manner and with functions and resources satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date:31-Mar-2011
Finance Agreement :Article IV. 4.01 (b) | Description :The Recipient has adopted a Project Operational Manual, in form andsubstance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :31-Mar-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 V (3) | Description :Not later than 4 months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall haveestablished a specialized procurement Tender Board in form and substance satisfactory to the Association and nominated all of itsmembers. | Due Date :03-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 V (4) | Description :Not later than 4 months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall install anintegrated financial management system within the PCU and provide relevant training to the PCU staff for its use. | Due Date:27-Aug-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 V (5) | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the staff of the PCU and the members of theTender Board shall undergo appropriate procurement training throughout Project implementation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 V (6) | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the staff of the PCU and other stakeholdersundergo appropriate safeguards training throughout Project implementation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 V (8) | Description :Not later than 10 months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall recruitan independent operations auditor to perform a technical audit of the FAC and, inter alia, on-site technical audits of theactivities financed under Part C.2 of the Project (the “Technical Audits”). | Due Date :24-Oct-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 V (9) | Description :The Recipient shall carry out the Technical Audits on a yearly basis, startingwith the first year after the conditions of Section IV.B.1 (d) of this Schedule 2 have been met. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 – Section II A (1) | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of theProject and prepare Reports in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.08 of the General Conditions and on the basis of theindicators satisfactory to the Association. Each Report shall cover the period of one calendar semester, and shall be submittednot later than one month after the end of the period covered | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 – Section II A (2) | Description :For purposes of Section 4.08 (c) of the General Conditions, thereport on the execution of the Project and related plan required pursuant to that Section shall be furnished to the Association notlater than 6 months after the Closing Date. | Due Date :30-Mar-2016

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 – Section II B (2) | Description :Without limitation on the provisions of Part A of this Section, theRecipient shall prepare and furnish to the Association as part of the Project Report, not later than 45 days after the end of eachcalendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactory tothe Association. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section IV. B(1)(a) - Withdrawal Conditions | Description :Retroactive financing of up to anaggregate of DTS 700,000 equivalent may be made for payments made prior to the legal agreement date but on or before May 1, 2010,for Category 1 expenses. | Due Date :27-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section IV. B(1)(b) - Withdrawal Conditions | Description :Adoption of Mt. Cameroon ManagementPlan; establishment of Mt. Cameroon park management structure; and compl., adopt. and discl. of Suppl. Soc. and Env. SafeguardInstruments (Cat. 2 expenses). | Due Date :30-Oct-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section IV. B(1)(c) - Withdrawal Conditions | Description :Updating and publ. of Campo Ma'an Man.Plan; strength. of Campo Ma'an park manag. struct.; and compl., adopt. and discl. of Suppl. Soc. and Env. Safeguard Instruments(Cat. 3 expenses). | Due Date :30-Oct-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. Section IV. B(1)(d) - Withdrawal Conditions | Description :Establishment of FAC, FAC ManagementUnit and FAC Review Committee and recruited staff in Sched. 2, Sect. I. C(1) and signing of Sub-Grant Agreement. | Due Date:30-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2. | Description :Not later than 4 months following effectiveness, the Recipient shall recruit theexternal auditors for the project in accordance with this Agreement & pursuant to TORS & qualifications acceptable | Due Date:27-Aug-2011
